San_Mateo.Hillsdale Shopping Center: Hillsdale Shopping Center is a shopping mall in San Mateo, California, currently anchored by Macy's and Nordstrom, and featuring over 130 stores and restaurants. The mall is located at the intersection of Hillsdale Boulevard and El Camino Real or CA-82, adjacent to the Hillsdale Caltrain Station and the former site of Bay Meadows Racetrack. The property is owned by Bohannon Development Co.
